note.p: Education: King's College, London; Queen's College, Cambridge. BA (1859), MA (1862)

Career: Fellow, Queen's College, Cambridge (1859-1872); First Assistant, Royal Observatory, Greenwich (1860); Royal Astronomer, Cape of Good Hope (1870); returned to England (1879); Radcliffe Observer, Oxford (1879)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1897-1898 vol 62 pp x-xxiii signed by D G
